Literature.Title: Soluble expression and purification of a crab antimicrobial peptide scygonadin in different expression plasmids and analysis of its antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Peng H, Yang M, Huang WS, Ding J, Qu HD, Cai JJ, Zhang N, Wang KJ
